### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a furnace at position (45.0, -83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a furnace at position (not specified)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (45.0, -83.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0)) and a chest at position (43.5, -82.5)
-  Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0)) and a chest at position (40.5, -80.5)
-  Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0)) and a chest at position (43.5, -81.5)
-  Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0)) and a chest at position (not specified)
-  Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0)) and a chest at position (not specified)

### Electricity Generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)) and a boiler at position (-6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)

### Copper Plate Mine at position (not specified)
No information available

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
-  Make sure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction
-  Ensure the chest is a valid entity and is not destroyed or removed

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
-  Make sure the furnace has enough space to hold the items you are trying to insert
-  Ensure the furnace is a valid entity and is not destroyed or removed

### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Make sure the burner inserter has enough fuel to operate
-  Ensure the burner inserter is a valid entity and is not destroyed or removed

### Errors when using steam engine
-  Make sure the steam engine has a valid input liquid and output connection
-  Ensure the steam engine is a valid entity and is not destroyed or removed

### Errors when using boiler
-  Make sure the boiler has enough fuel to operate
-  Ensure the boiler is a valid entity and is not destroyed or removed

### Errors when using offshore pump
-  Make sure the offshore pump is connected to a valid fluid system
-  Ensure the offshore pump is a valid entity and is not destroyed or removed
